Name: Industrial Open Toe Free Motion Embroidery Quilting Presser Foot
Short description: The Open Toe Free Motion Spring Foot provides clear visibility for free-motion quilting and embroidery. Its open front allows for easy stippling and design tracing, while the spring action prevents fabric lifting, reducing thread breakage. Ideal for thick materials like cotton and silk, it ensures smooth stitching and fits most industrial straight-stitch sewing machines.
Description:
The Open Toe Free Motion Spring Foot gives clear visibility when doing free motion quilting or embroidery.

Because of the open front, you can easily do stippling or follow a design in the fabric.

The spring action keeps the fabric from lifting with the needle as the stitch is being formed which helps eliminate thread breakage with specialty or heavier threads.

Be sure to use the appropriate needle for the thread you are using.

The presser foot helps easily move up and down with the needle, especially play well on thick materials, liked hollow cotton, silk and so on.

This spring-loaded foot helps avoid skipped stitches as the needle moves up and down with the foot.

Fits for most industrial straight stich sewing machine.

Name: Industrial Special Bead Sewing Foot
Short description: The Bead Sewing Foot is a specialized presser foot for industrial sewing machines, designed to sew over beaded and sequined fabrics effortlessly. It eliminates the need for hammering beads, prevents needle breakage and thread snapping, and protects the fabric’s structure. Achieve smooth, professional results with ease!
Description:
Specialized for Beaded & Sequined Fabrics: The Bead Sewing Foot is an essential presser foot attachment designed for industrial sewing machines, making it easier than ever to sew over beaded and sequined fabrics. If you've been struggling with broken beads, snapped needles, or damaged fabric while working with delicate embellishments, this foot is the perfect solution.

Say Goodbye to Hammering Beads: Traditionally, many sewists resort to hammering beads to create a clear stitch path, but this weakens the underlying mesh and affects the durability of the garment. With the Bead Sewing Foot, you can now sew directly over beaded and sequined fabrics without any extra preparation—no more hammering, no more frustration!

Protects Your Needles, Thread & Fabric: This presser foot is engineered to glide over beads and sequins, reducing the risk of needle breakage and thread snapping. It also preserves the integrity of delicate mesh fabrics, preventing unnecessary damage and ensuring a stronger, more durable stitch line.

Professional-Quality Finishing: Whether you’re working on bridal gowns, haute couture pieces, or decorative costumes, this foot helps you achieve smooth, even stitches without disruptions. It allows for effortless sewing, making intricate projects more manageable and time-efficient.

✅ No more hammering beads—saves time and protects fabrics

✅ Prevents needle breakage and thread snapping

✅ Keeps the underlying mesh intact for a stronger stitch line

✅ Achieves smooth, professional results with ease

Whether you're refreshing your Favorite sweater, coat, or upholstered furniture, this device ensures even trimming without damaging delicate fibbers, leaving your fabrics looking as good as new. The powerful motor ensures fast and effortless removal of unwanted fuzz, restoring your garments instantly.

Safety is a top priority, and our fabric pilling remover is designed with innovative protective features to prevent accidental injuries. The built-in automatic contact button instantly cuts off power when necessary, ensuring safe operation at all times. Additionally, the mesh cover features a bounce-off mechanism, further protecting you from potential harm. The device is crafted to prevent hand injuries, making it a reliable tool for both professionals and everyday users.

Gentle Yet Effective Garment Care

The solid stainless-steel grille maintains its shape even under pressure, ensuring precise and gentle trimming. The ergonomic, slightly curved body design provides a comfortable grip, allowing for effortless handling and extended use without strain.

Versatile Usage – Suitable for Various Fabrics

Whether you're refreshing thick woollen sweaters, delicate scarves, leggings, sofa cushions, or car seat covers, this fabric pilling remover is versatile enough to handle various materials with ease. It works efficiently on heavy knits, fine fabrics, and even plush toys, making it a must-have for garment maintenance, upholstery care, and fabric restoration.

Upgrade Your Fabric Care Routine Today!

Invest in a premium fabric pilling remover that offers durability, efficiency, and safety. Restore your Favorite outfits and furniture effortlessly while enjoying a professional-level garment care experience at home. Keep your clothes, furniture, and fabrics looking flawless with this powerful, easy-to-use fabric shaver—an essential tool for every wardrobe and home!

✂️ Smooth, Clean Cuts – No Fraying, No Hassle

This cutter is compatible with a wide range of materials including cotton, silk, denim, canvas, wool, leather, synthetic fibers, upholstery fabrics, quilting materials, and more.

🛠️ Ergonomic & Safe Design

User comfort meets industrial safety. The ergonomic handle reduces fatigue during extended use, while a sturdy base and blade guard offer added safety. This ensures both seasoned professionals and beginners can work with confidence and comfort.

Name: DPx5 Groz-Beckert Needle (size 16)
Short description: Ballpoint industrial needle designed for knit and stretch fabrics—prevents skipped stitches and fabric damage. Compatible with all machines using DPx5 needles.
Description:
The DPx5 needle is a specialized industrial sewing machine needle with a ballpoint tip, designed specifically for knit and stretch fabrics such as T-shirts, sweaters, and other soft, elastic materials. Its rounded tip gently pushes fabric fibers apart rather than piercing them, reducing the risk of skipped stitches and fabric damage. This ensures smooth penetration and consistent stitch quality on delicate or stretchy textiles.

\n

Compatible with industrial coverstitch machines and any other sewing machines that use DPx5 needles, it’s the perfect choice for professional results on knitwear.

Name: Rectangle Industrial Sewing Machine Feed Dog Cover/Darning Plate
Short description: The Darning Plate, also known as a darning foot, helps repair holes and tears by preventing fabric from being tugged during sewing. It also works well for sewing buttons and buttonholes, ensuring neat, professional repairs. Compatible with both industrial and manual sewing machines.\n\n
Description:
The Darning Plate, also known as a darning foot or plate, is a vital tool for achieving flawless repairs on fabrics with holes or tears. It works by preventing fabric from being pulled or stretched during sewing, ensuring that repairs are done smoothly and with precision. The plate covers the fabric feeder, allowing you to focus on the repair without the worry of fabric slipping or snagging.

\n

In addition to darning, this plate is also ideal for sewing buttons and is highly effective when used with a buttonhole attachment to sew buttonholes and perform bar tacking. Its versatility makes it an essential tool for a range of sewing tasks, including repairing garments and enhancing fabric finishes.

\n

This darning plate is compatible with both industrial sewing machines and manual machines, making it a great addition to any tailor or crafter's toolkit. Whether you're working on delicate fabrics or thicker materials, it helps maintain consistent stitch quality, ensuring a professional finish every time.

Name: Industrial A9 Ruffler Foot
Short description: The Industrial Ruffler Attachment quickly creates professional-looking ruffles or pleats on thin fabrics. It offers adjustable pleat depth (0-5mm) and allows precise control over pleat feeding and spacing, making it ideal for industrial single-needle sewing machines.
Description:
The Industrial Ruffler Attachment is designed to help you quickly and easily create professional-looking ruffles or pleats, making it an essential tool for any tailor or fashion designer. Ideal for use with thin fabrics, this attachment allows you to control the depth of pleats, adjustable from 0 to 5mm, for customized results. It produces one stitch per pleat, ensuring consistent, neat pleating throughout your project.

\n

The pleating feed amount is adjustable through a screw on the attachment, giving you complete control over the pleating process. The distance between pleats is managed by the feed dog of the machine, which works seamlessly with the ruffler attachment to ensure even pleats.

\n

Supplied with a needle clamp (#G9-32), this attachment fits industrial single-needle sewing machines, making it perfect for high-quality, efficient production. Whether you're working on fashion garments, home décor, or other sewing projects, this ruffler attachment will help you achieve a professional finish with minimal effort.

Name: Light Cream Polyester Thread
Short description: Our Polyester Sewing Thread is strong, durable, and perfect for both hand and machine sewing. It resists abrasion, fading, and fraying, ensuring long-lasting, high-quality results. Ideal for a wide range of fabrics, including cotton, denim, and leather, this thread provides a smooth finish and excellent colour retention, making it perfect for everyday and heavy-duty sewing projects.
Description:
Our Polyester Sewing Thread is crafted from high-quality polyester fibres, ensuring strength, durability, and a smooth finish for all your sewing projects. Known for its excellent resistance to abrasion, fading, and fraying, this thread is perfect for both hand and machine sewing. It offers superior colour retention, making it ideal for fabrics that will undergo frequent washing, such as uniforms, home textiles, and garments. The thread is lightweight yet incredibly strong, making it perfect for sewing a variety of materials, including cotton, denim, leather, and synthetic fabrics. It runs smoothly through sewing machines, minimizing thread breakage and tension issues. Whether you’re working on garments, upholstery, or DIY projects, this polyester sewing thread ensures a high-quality, professional finish every time. Key Features:
  • Durability: Resistant to wear and tear, offering long-lasting results.
  • Colourfast: Maintains its vibrant colour wash after wash.
  • Smooth Finish: Prevents knots and tangles during sewing.
  • Versatile Use: Perfect for various fabrics including cotton, silk, leather, and denim.
  • Strong & Reliable: Ideal for both everyday and heavy-duty sewing projects.
  • Available in a wide range of vibrant colours, this polyester sewing thread is perfectfor both beginner and professional seamstresses alike. Whether you're creating intricate designs, stitching clothing, or working on home décor projects, this high-quality thread will help you achieve flawless results.
Tags: Polyester Thread, sewing thread

Name: Industrial Sewing machine Wide Bias Attachment (Waist Band Folder)
Short description: The Industrial Sewing Machine Wide Bias Attachment automates the process of folding and attaching bias tape to fabric edges, creating a professional finish. Ideal for hems, necklines, cuffs, and waistbands, it saves time, ensures precision, and is versatile for various sewing projects.
Description:
An industrial sewing machine wide bias attachment, also known as a bias binder, is used to automatically fold and attach bias tape to fabric edges, creating a professional, finished look for hems, necklines, and other edges. Function: The attachment folds the bias tape around the fabric edge, and guides it into the stitching area, ensuring a clean and consistent finish. Benefits:
  • Speed and Efficiency: Automates the process of attaching bias tape, saving time and effort compared to manual methods.
  • Precision: Creates uniform, professional-looking finishes.
  • Versatility: Suitable for various projects, including clothing, quilting, and home décor.
How to Use:
  • Prepare the Bias Tape: Cut the bias tape to the desired length.
  • Attach the Bias Binder: Install the bias binder foot on your industrial sewing machine.
  • Feed the Bias Tape: Feed the bias tape through the channels of the binder foot.
  • Sew: Stitch along the edge of the fabric, with the bias tape folded and guided by the binder foot.
  • This bias attachment will give you an output of 1 inch tape suitable for cuffs and waist bands.
Categories: Sewing Machine Foots > Industrial Sewing Machine Foots & Attachments, Sewing Machine Foots
Tags: bias attachment, bias folder, bias foot, bias maker, waistband folder

Name: Industrial Adjustable Roller Unilateral Invisible Zipper Foot
Short description: This Portable Digital Measuring Tape offers a range of 0-199.999m with 5-unit options (meters, feet, inches, centimetres, millimetres). Featuring an easy-to-read LCD display, long battery life, and precision measurement capabilities for various applications, it's perfect for on-the-go use and ensures accurate, efficient results every time.
Description:
This specialized presser foot is designed to sew invisible zippers, which are coil zippers where the elements are hidden behind the tape, making the zipper virtually invisible when closed. Benefits:
  • Precision: The foot allows for accurate stitching close to the zipper teeth, resulting in a neat and professional finish.
  • Seamless Zipper: The foot helps create a seamless appearance, as the zipper is hidden and the seam is barely visible.
  • Versatility: It's suitable for various garments like pants, dresses, skirts, blouses, and trousers, as well as home furnishings like pillowcases and cushions.
How to use:
  • Attach the foot to your sewing machine, ensuring it is positioned correctly relative to the zipper teeth.
  • Set your needle position to the middle to avoid striking the foot.
  • Sew along the zipper, keeping the needle as close to the zipper teeth as possible.
Other uses: While primarily designed for invisible zippers, a zipper foot can also be used for sewing piping or cording, and attaching other elements where sewing close to a raised edge is necessary.
Categories: Sewing Machine Foots > Industrial Sewing Machine Foots & Attachments, Sewing Machine Foots
Tags: invisible zipper foot, multifunctional foot, sewing machine foot, unilateral invisible zipper foot

Name: Industrial Sewing Machine Teflon Gathering Foot
Short description: Industrial gathering presser foot compatible with most lockstitch machines. Ideal for evenly gathering tulle and lightweight fabrics without tearing. Perfect for ruffles, skirts, and decorative sewing.
Description:
This specialized presser foot is designed for gathering tulle and other lightweight fabrics with ease and precision. It is compatible with most industrial lockstitch sewing machines, making it an essential tool for professional tailors, fashion designers, and DIY sewing enthusiasts. Features & Benefits: ✔ Effortless Gathering – Creates beautiful, even gathers without damaging delicate fabrics. ✔ Precision & Consistency – Ensures uniform ruffles and pleats, perfect for dresses, skirts, and decorative accents. ✔ Durable Construction – Made from high-quality metal for long-lasting performance. ✔ Versatile Application – Ideal for gathering tulle, organza, chiffon, and other lightweight materials. ✔ Easy Installation – Quickly attaches to most industrial lockstitch sewing machines for smooth operation. How to Use:
  • Attach the Foot – Secure the gathering foot to your industrial sewing machine.
  • Adjust Stitch Settings – Select the appropriate stitch length and tension for desired gathers.
  • Feed the Fabric – Place the fabric under the foot and sew to create evenly spaced gathers.
  • Control the Fullness – Adjust fabric tension and stitch length for more or less gathering.
  • Perfect for bridal wear, ruffled skirts, and decorative fabric details, this Industrial Gathering Presser Foot enhances sewing efficiency and precision.

Short description: Multifunctional magnetic seam guide with clips for sewing straight lines and curves. Compatible with most machines; easy to reposition and adjust.

Unlike traditional seam guides, this Upgraded Magnetic Seam Guide with Clips offers enhanced precision and control, helping you sew straight lines or curves effortlessly—whether you're working on thin fabrics or thick layers. The strong magnetic base holds the guide securely in place, preventing fabric deviation and helping you maintain consistent seam allowances.

This multifunctional guide boasts four key features:

  1. Edge Limiting – Keeps your fabric aligned for straight stitching.

  2. Needle Thread Positioning – Assists in precise stitch placement.

  3. Anti-Curl Function – Prevents fabric edges from curling while sewing.

  4. Curved Sewing Capability – Makes it easier to handle curved seams neatly.

Universally compatible, this magnetic guide works with all major sewing machine brands like Singer, Brother, and more—as long as your machine has a metal plate under the presser foot. For machines without a metal base, it can be paired with a square sticky magnet to provide a secure hold.

Designed for convenience, you can easily adjust its position or change the angle of the pressure plate using the built-in screw—no tools required. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned tailor, this guide simplifies your sewing process and ensures neat, accurate results every time.

Name: Black Drape Tape
Short description: Draping tape is a flexible tool used by fashion designers to mark dressforms and assist in draping garments. Ideal for both beginners and professionals, it streamlines the design process for perfectly fitted pieces.
Description:
Draping tape is an essential tool used by fashion designers and tailors for marking dress forms or dummies during the garment creation process. It is a valuable tool for assisting in designing and draping garments, allowing designers to easily visualize and mark where style lines, seams, and other important garment features will be positioned. The tape is specifically designed to help with accurate body measurements and provides a guide for creating perfectly fitted and structured designs.

The tape is lightweight, flexible, and easy to use, ensuring that it stays in place on the fabric or dress form while you work. It is an ideal solution for both beginners and professionals in the fashion industry, helping to streamline the design process and ensure precise garment construction. Whether you're marking lines for dresses, skirts, tops, or pants, draping tape provides the clarity and accuracy needed to create beautiful, well-constructed garments.

This tool can be used on various fabric types and is essential for creating patterns, adjusting fit, and ensuring symmetry in designs. It’s a must-have for any designer or seamstress looking to refine their craft and improve their garment-making skills.

Name: Handskit LCD Adjustable Soldering Iron
Short description: The HANDSKIT [Simple] Soldering Iron is perfect for precision fabric work like cutting appliqués, sealing lace trims, and creating cutwork embroidery. With fast 15-second heat-up, adjustable temperature (180–480°C), and auto sleep mode, it’s ideal for tailors, designers, and crafters who need clean, fray-free cuts on delicate fabrics.
Description:
The HANDSKIT [Simple] Soldering Iron is not just for electronics—it’s also a game-changer for sewing, applique, lace work, and fabric crafting. Designed for precision, safety, and efficiency, this 90W soldering iron heats up in just 15 seconds, making it ideal for heat-sealing delicate edges, cutting intricate appliqués, trimming lace, or working on cutwork embroidery projects without fraying the fabric.

Its advanced blue LCD display lets you monitor and adjust temperature in 1°C increments, from 180°C to 480°C (356°F to 896°F)—perfect for switching between delicate and thicker fabrics. Whether you’re using it to create clean finishes on chiffon, satin, or mesh, or making precision cuts on more structured materials, you get full control every time.

The automatic 15-minute sleep mode helps extend the life of the tool and prevents heat damage when idle. It also features manual sleep-time settings and adjustable temperature controls—so you can customize it to your sewing workflow.

With PID temperature control, AD sampling, and PWM output, it maintains stable heat despite voltage fluctuations. That means consistent performance during long crafting sessions—great for tailors, fashion designers, DIYers, and embroidery artists.

This multi-functional kit comes with 5 different soldering tips (for various cutting styles and detailing), a tin wire tube, a mini stand, and a high-definition digital soldering iron—all housed in a portable, easy-to-use setup.

Certified by FCC, CE, and RoHS, this eco-friendly soldering iron is safe, non-toxic, and durable. Whether you’re using it to neatly cut out motifs, finish raw edges, or create intricate fabric designs, the HANDSKIT Soldering Iron is a must-have in every modern sewing room.

Not only does the Iron Cleaner Stick help you maintain your current iron, but it also saves you money in the long run. Regular use prevents the need for costly replacements by extending the lifespan of your iron.

Compact and lightweight, this cleaner is easy to store and carry, making it a convenient addition to your ironing routine. Whether you're a regular user or a professional, this cleaner stick is an essential tool for ensuring your iron always performs at its best.

Say goodbye to performance issues caused by dirt and grime build-up—keep your iron in top shape with the Hot Steam Iron Cleaner Stick!

Name: Gravity Steam Iron Thermostat Set
Short description: The thermostat for electric irons ensures optimal temperature control, preventing overheating and energy wastage. It provides precise temperature settings, ensuring smooth, wrinkle-free ironing on various fabrics. Easy to install, it helps enhance your ironing experience and safety.
Description:
The thermostat for electric irons is an essential component designed to regulate the temperature, ensuring the iron does not overheat when left unattended. When electricity passes through the coil of the iron, the heating element gets hot, and this heat is transferred to the iron’s base plate. However, without regulation, the heating element continues to get hotter as long as electricity is drawn, leading to energy wastage, potential damage to fabrics, and even fire hazards.

This is where the thermostat comes in. It effectively prevents the iron from reaching dangerously high temperatures, promoting safety and energy efficiency. The thermostat is designed to maintain the ideal temperature for various fabrics, providing consistent heat for smooth, wrinkle-free ironing.

With precise temperature control, it allows you to set the perfect heat level for your fabrics, preventing scorching or burning. Whether you’re ironing delicate fabrics or heavy-duty linens, the thermostat ensures that your iron delivers optimal results every time.

Key Features:

  • Precise Temperature Control: Set and maintain the ideal temperature for different fabrics, ensuring perfect ironing results.

  • Safety and Energy Efficiency: Prevents overheating, protecting fabrics and reducing energy consumption.

  • Easy Installation: Simple to install, allowing for quick upgrades to your iron, enhancing both safety and performance.

This thermostat is an essential upgrade to ensure the longevity of your iron while providing safe and efficient performance.
Tags: hanging bottle iron, industrial iron, pressing iron, steam iron, thermostat

Name: Sewing Thread Lubricating Oil Box
Short description: The Thread Lubricator Box helps prevent thread breaks, skipped stitches, snagging, static electricity, and heat build-up during sewing and embroidery. It is particularly useful when working with sticky or rubberized materials, ensuring smooth, uninterrupted stitching for optimal results. This tool enhances the performance of your sewing machine, making it easier to handle challenging fabrics.
Description:
The Thread Lubricator Box is an essential tool designed to improve the efficiency and quality of your sewing and embroidery projects. By providing a steady flow of lubrication to your thread, it helps prevent common sewing issues such as thread breaks, skipped stitches, snagging, and heat build-up.

This tool is especially beneficial when sewing with difficult materials like sticky fabrics, rubberized items, or any other challenging textiles that may cause friction. The lubricator ensures a smoother sewing experience, reducing the likelihood of thread snarls or machine malfunctions due to thread resistance.

Additionally, the lubricator minimizes the build-up of static electricity, which can lead to tangling and thread breakage, making it perfect for both regular and specialty sewing tasks. It ensures that your machine runs smoothly, helping to maintain optimal sewing performance and achieve professional-quality results.

Name: Adjustable Bilateral Compensating Foot

Description:
The compensating presser foot is an essential tool for achieving neat, even stitches along the edge of your fabric. Designed for industrial sewing machines, it helps guide the fabric precisely for consistent results.

There are different variations available:

  • Right toe foot: Guides fabric to the right of the needle for edge stitching.

  • Left toe foot: Guides fabric to the left of the needle.

  • Bilateral foot: Combines both right and left toes in one foot—offering great value and convenience.

  • Adjustable foot: Features moveable levers for customizable edge stitching, providing added precision for a professional finish.

Ideal for topstitching, hemming, and edge finishing, this foot helps tailors and designers produce clean, polished garments every time.

Name: Cording Attachment
Short description:
Cording Foot Attachment – For Neat, Precise Cord Covering
Perfect for making your own piping! This foot allows you to stitch very close to the cord while covering it with fabric. Works best with fabric cut on the true bias.
Description:
Cording Foot Attachment – Precision Sewing for Piping and Decorative Edging

Take your sewing projects to the next level with the Cording Foot Attachment—the perfect tool for creating beautifully covered cords and custom piping. This presser foot is designed to let you stitch very close to the cord as you wrap it with fabric, ensuring clean, professional results every time.

🔹 Ideal For:

  • Creating piping for cushions, garments, and upholstery

  • Adding decorative edges to your projects

  • Seamlessly stitching over fabric-covered cords

💡 Tip for Best Results:
To achieve smooth curves and flexibility, cut your covering fabric on a true bias—this is the diagonal fold created when you fold a square piece of fabric in half diagonally. Bias-cut fabric wraps neatly around the cord without puckering.

Compatible with most sewing machines using a snap-on or low-shank foot system. Whether you're sewing home décor, fashion pieces, or crafts, this foot saves time and improves finish.
